Post-Match Reflections: India might have qualified for the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: If Australia beat Afghanistan, both they and India will move into the final four
Others: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli struggled in the opening partnership
Tanzim Hasan was Bangladesh's best bowler
Rishabh Pant was the firestarter for India
Rishad Hossain secured Bangladesh's best period of play in this game
